prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a muscular build and a striking blue color scheme.
Imagine a Pokemon that excels in aquatic battles, featuring a round body and strong arms.
Generate a design for a Pokemon that can swim swiftly and has unique spiral patterns.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of determination and strength in water environments.
Make a cool water-fighting type Pokemon that uses its fists in battle and has a fierce look.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in wetlands, showcasing both agility and power.
Give me an idea for a Pokemon that has a unique ability to create whirlpools during combat.
